src:
Da série: porque os homens vivem menos que as mulheres
07 Nov 2019, 20:36 by Joe



Conta a lenda de que aquele que passar dentre os galhos da ÁRVORE MALDITA somente sobrevive se tiver coração puro…
Mas isso não tem nada a ver com a cena, aqui foi só burrice mesmo…
text:
From the series: Why men live less than women
07 Nov 2019, 20:36 by Joe



Legend has it that anyone who passes through the branches of the CURVE TREE will only survive if he has a pure heart…
But this has nothing to do with the scene, it was just stupid here…
